casebody.data:
Third Department,

August, 1979

(August 9, 1979)* Robert S. Stewart, Respondent, v State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance Company, Appellant, et., Defendant.

Not reported with other decisions of August 9, 1979, 71 AD2d 964. [Rep.

Motion for reargument granted, without costs, and upon reargument, we adhere to our original decision. Mahoney, P. J., Sweeney, Kane, Staley, Jr., and Herlihy, JJ., concur.
